articles.title: Meme-stock mania makes Donald Trump's TMTG bigger than Etsy, Hasbro - Business Insider
articles.description: Truth Social's owner, which counts Donald Trump as its biggest shareholder, is now worth more than American Airlines and Ralph Lauren by one measure.
articles.content:
Meme-stock mania has boosted the value of Trump Media & Technology Group beyond Etsy, Hasbro, and Paramount Global three S&P 500 companies worth nearly $8 billion each.

articles.title: Japanese Yen remains on the defensive, bears turn cautious amid intervention fears - FXStreet
articles.description: The Japanese Yen (JPY) struggles to capitalize on the previous day's modest recovery against its American counterpart from the lowest level since 1990 and edges lower during the Asian session on Thursday.
articles.content:
• The Japanese Yen meets with a fresh supply in the wake of the BoJ’s dovish outlook.
